forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
